div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Attachment|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 ComplexType `Attachment` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `Attachment` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Attachment`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Attachment.contentType` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Attachment.contentType`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Attachment.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Attachment.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Attachment.data` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Attachment.data`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Attachment.url` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Attachment.url`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Attachment.size` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Attachment.size`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Attachment.hash` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Attachment.hash`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Attachment.title` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Attachment.title`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Attachment.creation` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Attachment.creation`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Attachment.height` has a context of Attachment based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Attachment`.
Element `Attachment.width` has a context of Attachment based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Attachment`.
Element `Attachment.frames` has a context of Attachment based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Attachment`.
Element `Attachment.duration` has a context of Attachment based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Attachment`.
Element `Attachment.pages` has a context of Attachment based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Attachment`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

comment.value: FHIR R5 ComplexType `Attachment` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `Attachment` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Attachment`, but has no comparisons.
